WriteNames.notNumberAlert: Players count should be a number!

Menu.passAlertMessage: You did not choose anyone are you sure to pass your turn?

RoleBlock.roleBlockedMessage: You have been role blocked this night
RoleBlock.RBimmuneMessage: Someone tried to role block you but you are immune
RoleBlock.roleBlockMessage: You have role blocked your target

SealMaster.name: Sigillum Dominus
SealMaster.abilities: You can role block someone in the night

Interrupter.name: Interdictor
Interrupter.abilities: You can role block someone in the night

DarkRevealer.name: Tenebris Revelator
DarkRevealer.abilities: At night you see someone's role

Psycho.name: Furiosus
Psycho.killMessage: You have slain your target successfully
Psycho.slainMessage: has been slain by a Psycho
Psycho.defenceMessage: You could not slain your target because your attack was not powerful enough

Assassin.name: Venator Tenebrarum
Assassin.attributes: You have basic defence and attack, you are immune to role blocking
Assassin.goal: Kill every folk and corrupter member
Assassin.killMessage: You have slain your target successfully
Assassin.slainMessage: has been slain by an Assassin
Assassin.defenceMessage: You could not slain your target because your attack was not powerful enough

Detective.name: Investigatore
Detective.abilities: You choose one and see two roles, including that person's role

Observer.name: Spectator
Observer.abilities: At night you can see which team a person belongs to

Stalker.name: Umbra Venator
Stalker.abilities: You choose a person and see who that person goes to at night
Stalker.nobodyMessage: Your target did not visited anybody

Soulbinder.name: Vinculum Animarum
Soulbinder.abilities: You choose someone at night and if they get attacked, you prevent them from dying
Soulbinder.abilityMessage: You have successfully protected your target

SimplePerson.name: Simple Soul
SimplePerson.attributes: If you reveal your role you will lose the game
SimplePerson.abilities: Just simple person. You do nothing

LastJoke.name: Echo of Laughter
LastJoke.abilities: When you die you will comeback to life and you must kill one player
LastJoke.slainMessage: Someone make their Last Joke to

Clown.name: Madman
Clown.goal: You have to die at night by someone to win the game

Disguiser.name: Phantom Cloak
Disguiser.abilities: Disguise to random role every night but you can't know until you use it

Darkseer.name: Specularis
Darkseer.abilities: You see the role of two living people, but you cannot see the role owner
Darkseer.abilityMessage: The roles of the two currently living player in the play are:
Darkseer.oneLeftMessage: The role of the currently living person in the play is:
Darkseer.zeroLeftMessage: There are not any players to see their role

Blinder.name: Blinder
Blinder.abilities: When you blind someone that player perform their ability randomly
